name: Project WITCH
description:
What do you do when you're in trouble?

Play as four Heroines that woke up on a strange world, and doing what they knew best, saved the day by beating up some goblins and even more dangerous foes.

A short history with an incredible art direction that will lead you to an amazing ending.

Game made with RPG Maker MV in one month to the IGMC 2017.
